sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.GenAISkillSearchOutputsProcessor</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>This is a Generative AI Skill Search outputs (results) processor.  It filters skills based on a confidence policy (sys_property "com.glide.one.extend.capability.genai.skill.search.confidence.policy" -- the allowed  values are MATCHING or SOMEWHAT_MATCHING).  It marks up the outputs result with "skills" and "unfiltered_skills".

MATCHING means only accept skills returned from the provider-specific skill search that match a provider-specific criteria (e.g., if a provider score is > .8 then it matches).

SOMEWHAT_MATCHING mean accept all skills returned from the provider-specific skill search.</description>
        <name>GenAISkillSearchOutputsProcessor</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var GenAISkillSearchOutputsProcessor = Class.create();
GenAISkillSearchOutputsProcessor.prototype = {
    initialize: function(skillCriteriaPredicate, skillScoreGetter) {
		this._skillCriteriaPredicate = skillCriteriaPredicate;
		this._skillScoreGetter = skillScoreGetter;
		this._MATCHING = "MATCHING";
		this._SOMEWHAT_MATCHING = "SOMEWHAT_MATCHING";
		this._confidencePolicy = gs.getProperty("com.glide.one.extend.capability.genai.skill.search.confidence.policy", this._MATCHING);
    },

	process: function(outputs, skills, rawResponse) {
		var qualifyingSkills = {"skills": [], "unfiltered_skills": rawResponse};
		for (var i = 0; i < skills.length; i++) {
			var skill = skills[i];
			var score = this._skillScoreGetter(skill);
			var meetsCriteria = this._skillCriteriaPredicate(skill);
			skill.confidence = meetsCriteria ? this._MATCHING : this._SOMEWHAT_MATCHING;
			if (meetsCriteria || this._SOMEWHAT_MATCHING.equalsIgnoreCase(this._confidencePolicy)) {
				skill.extra = {"provider_score": ("" + score)};
				qualifyingSkills.skills.push(skill);
			}
		}
		outputs.result.response = JSON.stringify(qualifyingSkills);
	},

    type: 'GenAISkillSearchOutputsProcessor'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-10-23 20:23:58</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>9a541ff5eb023110c27601c7c1522856</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>24</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>GenAISkillSearchOutputsProcessor</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">48d279e293400210b31a30dcebba1077</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9a541ff5eb023110c27601c7c1522856</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-11-15 15:44:40</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
